description: Explore how Mintable uses blockchain technology to revolutionize Open Source Software by ensuring intellectual property management, enhancing collaboration, and increasing security. Discover the role of NFTs in software licensing and the potential benefits and challenges faced in Mintable's transformative shift in software development.
keywords: Mintable, Blockchain, Open Source Software, OSS, Intellectual Property, Collaboration, Security, NFTs, Smart Contracts, Software Licensing, Transparency, Innovation
title: Mintable's Blockchain Impact on Open Source Software
